EmailTemplate.description: AMP branded email to customers who've had Autopay errors
EmailTemplate.name: CS Autopay Error Email - AMP
EmailTemplate.subject: There Was An Issue With Your Autopayment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear <First Name>,
We are writing to notify you that we encountered a problem processing your BlueWave Community Solar payment. For your reference, the transaction produced the following error message: <Error Message>. Please note your payment is due <current bill due date>.
Please log into your Community Solar Portal and update your payment information.
To update your payment information:
Log into your Community Solar Portal Navigate to the My Account tab Click the “Update My Payment Info” tab Enter your new payment information Agree to the usage terms Save your new payment information
If you have any questions or would like assistance updating your payment information, please email BlueWave Customer Support here or give us a call at 844.786.4100.
We look forward to a bright future ahead!
- All of us here at AMP and BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
